snippet: The Times reporter Anahad O’Connor writes about the connection between his 2013 Science Times article about herbal supplements and an investigation by the New York attorney general’s office.
abstract: The Times reporter Anahad O’Connor writes about the connection between his 2013 Science Times article about herbal supplements and an investigation by the New York attorney general’s office.

headline.main: Times Article Prompts Investigation Into Herbal Supplements
